nodes.text: The Galactic Gaming Commission, also called the Gaming Authority, was the organization governing the conduction of gambling activities.

Commissioner Dragomir Chlorus worked for the Gaming Commission in the waning days of the Galactic Republic. He was responsible for monitoring the gladiatorial fights between prisoners set up by Warden Sadiki Blirr at the Cog Hive Seven prison and that were funded by the InterGalactic Banking Clan.
